item.title: About
item.description: Thomas Sermpinis is OSCP Certified and actively looking for new challenges in the field of Information Security, Red Team Operations, Penetration Testing and Security Research. He has ethically reported web vulnerabilities to known companies such as AT&T, IBM, Acronis and Xiaomi while in his free time he also hacks machines at hackthebox.eu. He currently works as a Cyber Security Consultant with main interests around Automotive security - research and penetration testing.
